info.title: Bluesky (Independent Publisher)
info.description: The HTTP API Bluesky API enables programmatic interaction with user timelines, posting, profiles, feeds and admin functions.

get.description: Retrieve a list of posts from a specified user's timeline.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The username or user ID for the timeline.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of posts to retrieve, up to a maximum limit.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the post was created.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

post.description: Publish a new status update to the user's feed.

content.description: The text content of the post (max 280 characters).

attachments.description: Array of URLs for any media attachments.

id.description: Unique identifier of the created post.

content.description: The content of the created post.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

400.description: Invalid request - post content is too long or missing required parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve profile information for a specified user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The username or user ID of the profile to retrieve.

following_count.description: Count of accounts the user is following.

profile_image.description: URL to the user's profile image.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve a list of followers that are known to follow a specific user.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The handle or user ID of the user to retrieve known followers for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of followers to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch additional results.

displayName.description: The display name of the follower.

avatar.description: URL of the follower's avatar image.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

post.description: Send a message to a conversation.

conversationId.description: ID of the conversation to send the message to.

attachments.description: Array of URLs for any media attachments.

messageId.description: Unique identifier of the sent message.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve the relationship status between the specified user and other users.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The handle or user ID of the subject whose relationships are being queried.

parameters.name: objects
parameters.description: List of handles or user IDs to check relationships with the subject.

handle.description: The handle of the other user.

isFollowing.description: Whether the subject is following this user.

isFollowedBy.description: Whether this user is following the subject.

isMuted.description: Whether the subject has muted this user.

isBlocking.description: Whether the subject is blocking this user.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

post.description: Upload a video file to Bluesky.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The video file to upload.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the video.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the video.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags associated with the video.

videoId.description: Unique identifier of the uploaded video.

status.description: Status of the upload (e.g., processing, completed).

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve the feed of posts for a specified user or tag.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The handle or user ID to retrieve the feed for. If not specified, retrieves the global feed.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A tag to filter the feed by. Only posts containing this tag will be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Retrieve posts before this timestamp.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve a list of recommended users to follow for new users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of recommended users to retrieve.

handle.description: The handle of the recommended user.

displayName.description: Display name of the recommended user.

followerCount.description: Number of followers the recommended user has.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve a list of starter packs, which are collections of recommended users to follow.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of starter packs to retrieve.

packId.description: Unique identifier for the starter pack.

displayName.description: Display name of the recommended user.

followerCount.description: Number of followers the recommended user has.

users.description: List of recommended users in the starter pack.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users that the specified user has blocked.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The handle or user ID for which to retrieve the blocked users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of blocked users to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch additional results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of blocked users.

handle.description: The handle of the blocked user.

displayName.description: The display name of the blocked user.

avatar.description: URL of the blocked user's avatar image.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users blocked by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of blocked users to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch additional results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of blocked users.

handle.description: The handle of the blocked user.

displayName.description: The display name of the blocked user.

avatar.description: URL of the blocked user's avatar image.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users who liked a specified post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the post to retrieve likes for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of likes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch additional results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of users who liked the post.

handle.description: The handle of the user who liked the post.

displayName.description: The display name of the user who liked the post.

avatar.description: URL of the user's avatar image who liked the post.

likedAt.description: The timestamp when the user liked the post.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Retrieve a list of specific posts by their IDs.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Array of post IDs to retrieve.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

likesCount.description: Number of likes the post has received.

commentsCount.description: Number of comments on the post.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Search for posts that match a specific query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query to match posts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch additional results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved search results for posts.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

likesCount.description: Number of likes the post has received.

commentsCount.description: Number of comments on the post.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

get.description: Search for user accounts based on a query string.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query to find user accounts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to retrieve, up to a maximum limit.

bio.description: Bio or description of the actor.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a list of feed posts from a specified actor.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose feeds are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of posts.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the post was created.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of posts, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a generated feed based on user preferences.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user for whom the feed is generated.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of feed items.

id.description: Unique identifier for the feed item.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the feed item was created.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of feed items, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a skeletal version of a feed for faster loading and minimal content structure.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user for whom the feed skeleton is retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to retrieve in the feed skeleton.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of feed skeleton items.

id.description: Unique identifier for the skeleton item.

placeholderText.description: Placeholder text or minimal content to display quickly.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the skeleton item was created.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of feed skeleton items, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

post.description: Mute a conversation for a specific user.

convoId.description: The unique identifier of the conversation to mute.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user muting the conversation.

convoId.description: The ID of the muted conversation.

userId.description: The ID of the user who muted the conversation.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a list of conversations for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of conversations to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of conversations.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of conversations.

lastMessage.description: The content of the last message in the conversation.

participants.description: List of participants' user IDs in the conversation.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last message in the conversation.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of conversations, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

convoId.description: The unique identifier of the conversation to leave.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user leaving the conversation.

convoId.description: The ID of the conversation left.

userId.description: The ID of the user who left the conversation.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve details about a specific conversation.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the conversation to retrieve.

participants.description: List of participant user IDs in the conversation.

sender.description: User ID of the message sender.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

messages.description: List of messages in the conversation.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last message in the conversation.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Export the account data for the authenticated user.

accountData.description: Exported account data in JSON format.

email.description: Email address associated with the account.

lastMessage.description: Content of the last message in the conversation.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last update in the conversation.

conversations.description: List of conversations associated with the account.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve the upload limits for videos, such as maximum file size and duration.

maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size allowed for video uploads, in bytes.

maxDuration.description: Maximum duration allowed for video uploads, in seconds.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve recommended starter packs of actors for new users to follow.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of starter packs to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of starter packs.

packId.description: Unique identifier for the starter pack.

bio.description: Bio or description of the actor.

actors.description: List of actors included in the starter pack.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of starter packs, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve metadata about the feed generator, such as supported types and limits.

maxFeedItems.description: Maximum number of items allowed in a feed.

maxItemSize.description: Maximum size allowed for each item in the feed.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a list of posts that quote a specific post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the post for which to retrieve quotes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of quotes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of quotes.

200.description: Successfully retrieved quotes for the post.

quoteId.description: Unique identifier for the quote post.

author.description: Username of the author of the quote post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the quote was created.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of quotes, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a list of suggested feeds for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of suggested feeds to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of suggested feeds.

feedId.description: Unique identifier for the suggested feed.

author.description: Username of the author of the suggested feed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the feed was created.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of suggested feeds, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.summary: Get Users Who Reposted a Post
get.description: Retrieve a list of users who reposted a specific post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the post for which to retrieve reposts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of reposts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of reposts.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of users who reposted the post.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user who reposted.

username.description: Username of the user who reposted.

displayName.description: Display name of the user who reposted.

repostedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was reposted.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of reposts, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

post.description: Send an interaction (like, repost) for a specified post.

postId.description: The unique identifier of the post to interact with.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user sending the interaction.

status.description: Confirmation status of the interaction, e.g., 'success'.

interactionId.description: Unique identifier for the sent interaction.

postId.description: The ID of the post that was interacted with.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user to follow.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user to unfollow.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user to mute.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user to unmute.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users muted by the authenticated user.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of muted users.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the muted user.

displayName.description: Display name of the muted user.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

post.description: Mark notifications as seen up to a specified timestamp.

seenAt.description: Timestamp to mark notifications as seen up to this point.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Search for accounts based on criteria such as username, email, or other attributes.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for finding accounts (e.g., username or email).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of accounts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved accounts matching the search criteria.

email.description: Email address associated with the account.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of accounts, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve a list of invite codes along with metadata such as expiration and usage counts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of invite codes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination to retrieve the next set of invite codes.

parameters.name: available
parameters.description: Filter to show only available (unused) invite codes.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the invite code was created.

expiresAt.description: Expiration date of the invite code, if applicable.

usageCount.description: Number of times the invite code has been used.

maxUsage.description: Maximum number of uses allowed for this invite code.

available.description: Indicates if the invite code is still available for use.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next set of invite codes, if available.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve detailed account information for a specified user account, including administrative metadata.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account to retrieve information for.

email.description: Email address associated with the account.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the account.

metadata.description: Additional administrative metadata related to the account.

suspensionReason.description: Reason for account suspension, if applicable.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve detailed account information for multiple specified user accounts.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: A list of account IDs to retrieve information for. Multiple IDs can be passed as separate parameters.

200.description: Successfully retrieved account information for specified accounts.

email.description: Email address associated with the account.

status.description: Current status of the account (e.g., active, suspended).

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the account.

metadata.description: Additional administrative metadata related to the account.

suspensionReason.description: Reason for account suspension, if applicable.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

404.description: One or more accounts not found.

post.description: Update access settings for a specified user account, allowing moderators to restrict or restore access.

actorId.description: The unique identifier of the user whose access is being updated.

accessLevel.description: The access level to set for the user (e.g., restricted, active).

reason.description: Reason for updating the user's access level.

200.description: Successfully updated access level for the user.

status.description: Confirmation status of the update, e.g., 'success'.

actorId.description: The ID of the user whose access level was updated.

newAccessLevel.description: The new access level assigned to the user.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve the context around a specific message, including surrounding messages, to assist with moderation.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the message for which to retrieve context.

parameters.name: beforeLimit
parameters.description: The number of messages to retrieve before the specified message.

parameters.name: afterLimit
parameters.description: The number of messages to retrieve after the specified message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was created.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

get.description: Retrieve moderation-related metadata for a specified user account.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user account to retrieve metadata for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved moderation metadata for the user account.

status.description: Current moderation status of the user (e.g., 'active', 'restricted', 'suspended').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the report was created.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last update to the user's moderation metadata.

notes.description: Any additional notes related to the user's moderation history.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters.

message.description: A descriptive message explaining the error.
